name: Quartermaster (itch) (tigerrenko)
description:
JamCraft 3 was motivaton for me to try and test this idea which has been in my mind and doodles for years now. 

Thanks to wonderful people on board:

ThayBrownie as GUI master

ClockMaker as composer of our beautiful OST

Valentin Faucon as character designer 

and

Seba for making pro GUI that we unfortunately didn't use!

Anyway
This is a bit different game, your goal is to escape through lower right corner of the map while being hunted by government. Key is keeping your troops fed and high in morale. You can't control the outcome of battles, but you can plot the course, forage for food and - cook!
